Articles.Content:
I made a probe bomber, powered from solar energy! It can store lot's of electric charge, and it flies OK! It's a little hard to get it to takeoff, but when it does, it's pretty flyable. Here's a download link: https://www./?l4xs6waczppywlq

Video of me flying it:

Edited July 31, 2014 by sumghai
Fixed image and video
Well Done. Its a electric bomber suppaleggera
That's pretty sweet! You have inspired me to revisit ion-powered aircraft!
Interesting! An expendable, tiny flying bomb! It reminds me of a V-1 in a way. Well designed, very innovative.

LOL! Bomb mode! As you were rolling down the runway, and also flying, all I could think was, "Stow the gear, bro!" Once you're moving along at a good clip on the ground, you can retract the gear and take off that way, when your wheels are all the way in the back.

Honestly, this is most likely an infini-glider. The control surfaces generate thrust, and I noticed in the video that the craft's rear was moving up and down as if it was flapping its control surfaces.

I made a probe bomber, powered from solar energy! It can store lot's of electric charge, and it flies OK! It's a little hard to get it to takeoff, but when it does, it's pretty flyable. Here's a download link: https://www./?l4xs6waczppywlq

Video of me flying it:

Picture:http://imgur.com/1zJjSQk

(If it doesn't load, right click it and open it in new tab, or watch the video)

Um...it does nit soundright to put!!! All the way!!!
